title: Championship Chests?
body:
What do they drop?
There are new championship chests. Are they worth?

replies.body: Can you get gemstones from them?
Tier 2 icon does not appear to give an emote.

Ok, Targon already described this but I'll make it simpler. There is a limited time, free icon you can get for world's. Each championship box you get gives you 3 shards. Use 10 to make it anext exclusive gold icon. FOR THE RECALL AND IN GAME ICON buy a 250 rp icon of your team choice, then upgrade it with 10 championship shards previously mentioned. This gives you the in-game icon, of your teams choice, in gold. To get the recall upgrade it again for 12 shards to make the icon diamond and have your team logo under your feet when you back.  NOTE THE EMOTE AND MASTERY ICON ARE REMOVED AFTER WORLDS.

If you're interested in any of the sweet new team recalls, most definitely #worth! Any chests that are purchased during Worlds will come with bonus Championship Jewels that can be redeemed for the higher tier Team Icons as well.

> **UPGRADE CHART**

> 10 Championship Jewels -------------> Tier 2
> 12 Championship Jewels -------------> Tier 3

> * Hextech Chests during Worlds award you 3 Championship Jewels


> * Purchase Championship Jewel Tokens for 150 IP on Broadcast days*, which **awards you 2 Championship Jewels.**


You can find the broadcast schedule [here.](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/worlds/world_championship_2016/schedule/default) Additionally, you can find the official announcement for this event [here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/worlds-2016-hits-rift)
